text:
varddha#ntu tvA suShTuqtayOq girO# mE yUqyaM pA#ta svaqstiBiqH sadA# naH ||
pra tat tE# aqdya Si#piviShTaq nAmAq&ryaH Sa(gm)# sAmi vaqyunA#ni viqdvAn | 
tantvA# gRuNAmi taqvasaqmata#vIyAqn kShaya#ntamaqsya raja#saH parAqkE ||
kimit tE# viShNO pariqcakShya#M BUqt pra yadva#vaqkShE Si#piviqShTO a#smi | 
mA varpO# aqsmadapa# gUha EqtadyadaqnyarU#paH samiqthE baqBUtha# || 68
